The latter shows up in human form on Ã¢â‚¬Å“Bible on the Dash,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ about a touring band that relies on a purloined copy of the Good Book to get out of speeding tickets (Ã¢â‚¬Å“My foot is heavy with redemptionÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½) and worse.
